short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browser into a high-speed experience with the Ferrari F1 Car Theme.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Designed for fans of speed, precision, and the legendary Ferrari Formula 1 team, this theme enhances both the visual appeal and functionality of your browser. Feel the adrenaline of the racetrack every time you open a new tab, while enjoying practical features that keep you organized and efficient.

With shortcuts, you can instantly access your favorite websites. Whether you're catching up on F1 news, connecting on social media, or streaming your favorite content, this feature allows for seamless navigation, saving you time with just one click.

Stay on track with the time and date display integrated into your new tab. This handy feature keeps you punctual and organized without needing to switch between tabs, so you can focus on what matters while enjoying the sleek visuals of Ferrari’s F1 dominance.

The bookmark function helps you manage your most visited sites effortlessly. Whether it’s racing updates, automotive forums, or daily essentials, you can organize your online resources in one convenient location, making browsing smoother and faster.

Need to jot something down? The notes feature is perfect for quick reminders, to-do lists, or capturing inspiration. Your notes are securely saved within the browser, keeping them easily accessible whenever you need them.

For those who love variety, the theme switching option offers multiple Ferrari F1-inspired backgrounds. Each new tab showcases a different stunning image, from iconic race cars to dynamic team moments, keeping your browsing experience fresh and exciting.
